message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to purchase this incredible product. Given its unique value proposition, I'm initially proposing a price of $2,200,000. I believe this is a fair starting point for negotiations, considering the potential returns you'll see.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm looking to negotiate a better price. Considering the product's value, I'm willing to pay $1,400,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. It demonstrates your understanding of the value this product brings. To find a middle ground, I'm proposing a price of $1,900,000. This reflects the product's unique features and the long-term benefits it will offer your business.

I understand your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still looking to negotiate a better price. Considering the product's value and the market, I'm willing to pay $1,600,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the benefits the product will bring to my business.
